DOC.brief_summary: The phase III clinical trial examines efficacy , safety , tolerability addition MK0431/ONO-5435 Japanese patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) inadequate glycemic control diet/exercise therapy voglibose monotherapy
DOC.brief_title: MK0431/ONO-5435 Phase III Clinical Trial -Add-on Voglibose Study Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( MK0431-104 )
DOC.criteria: Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control On Diet/Exercise Therapy And Voglibose Monotherapy Patients Have A History Of Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
